title: [SOLVED] Server Transfer Issue
body: Yesterday I failed to move to the Japanese server as the purchase failed. Now when I go to the purchasing area to transfer to Japanese server from US, the transfer itself it gone. Anyone else having the same issue? If not please help, I bought like 5000RP just to move to that server.

replies.body: I believe Japan is one of those special cases where you need to physically be in Japan before you'll be able to transfer over to that region. AFAIK it has something to do with certain laws, but you're welcome to check out our [**account transfer faq**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924) or shoot us a ticket for more details.
